short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost job applications with AI! Turn your resume into a unique cover letter instantly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crafting the perfect cover letter has never been easier. Gone are the days of spending hours staring at a blank page, struggling to find the right words to showcase your skills and experience. This extension empowers you to create professional and impactful cover letters in a matter of minutes through the use of AI.

How it works!

This uses a user's resume, in conjunction with the number of years of experience, to generate a CV that accurately reflects the skills of the person using it. It aligns your skills with the job description for which you're applying, eliminating the need to write a separate CV for each job application. Instead, you can apply with ease, knowing your skills will be adequately represented in your CV!
